entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 12:41 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
